BugInstance.message: Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.sqlfederation.executor.FilterableTableScanExecutor.execute(DatabaseType, QueryContext, ShardingSphereDatabase, ExecutionContext) converts checked exception to unchecked
org.apache.shardingsphere.sqlfederation.executor.FilterableTableScanExecutor.getParameters(List): 1st parameter 'paramIndexes' could be declared as java.lang.Iterable instead
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sqlfederation.executor.FilterableTableScanExecutor.getParameters(List) does not presize the allocation of a collection

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sqlfederation.executor.FilterableTableScanExecutor.createQueryContext(ShardingSphereMetaData, SqlString, DatabaseType, boolean) passes constant String of length 1 to character overridden method

Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.sqlfederation.executor.TranslatableTableScanExecutor.execute(DatabaseType, QueryContext, ShardingSphereDatabase, ExecutionContext) converts checked exception to unchecked

Unconstrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.sqlfederation.executor.TranslatableTableScanExecutor.executeScalarEnumerable(DatabaseType, QueryContext, ShardingSphereDatabase, ExecutionContext) converts checked exception to unchecked
org.apache.shardingsphere.sqlfederation.executor.TranslatableTableScanExecutor.getParameters(List): 1st parameter 'paramIndexes' could be declared as java.lang.Iterable instead
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sqlfederation.executor.TranslatableTableScanExecutor.getParameters(List) does not presize the allocation of a collection

Method org.apache.shardingsphere.sqlfederation.executor.TranslatableTableScanExecutor.createQueryContext(ShardingSphereMetaData, SqlString, DatabaseType, boolean) passes constant String of length 1 to character overridden method
Static or private method org.apache.shardingsphere.sqlfederation.executor.TranslatableTableScanExecutor.getScalarRows(MergedResult, QueryResultMetaData) has unused parameters
Constrained method org.apache.shardingsphere.sqlfederation.row.SQLFederationRowEnumerator.close() converts checked exception to unchecked
